pacman.model

类 Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.model.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a set of bar obstacles obstacles and a set of ghost bar obstacles ghostObstacles. This class stores the data for the maze, which are all rectangles that can be displayed.
    另请参阅:
    GameModel

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      the set of ghostBarObstacle
      java.util.ArrayList<BarObstacle> obstacles
      the set of BarObstacle

      • obstacles

    • 方法详细资料

      • isTouching

        public java.lang.Boolean isTouching(double x,
                                    double y,
                                    double padding)
        Checks if point is touching obstacles.
        参数:
        x - - index of x
        y - - index of y
        padding - - gap between the point and obstacles
        返回:
        true if point is touching obstacles, false if point is not touching obstacles

      • isGhostTouching

        public java.lang.Boolean isGhostTouching(double x,
                                         double y,
                                         double padding)
        Checks if point is touching ghost obstacles.
        参数:
        x - - index of x
        y - - index of y
        padding - the gap between the ghost edge and ghost obstacles
        返回:
        true if point is touching ghostObstacles, false if point is not touching ghsotObstacles

      • hasObstacle

        public java.lang.Boolean hasObstacle(double fromX,
                                     double toX,
                                     double fromY,
                                     double toY)
        Check if there's an obstacle in the rectangular area. In the rectangular area designated by fromX, fromY, toX, toY, check whether all points in this area is not touching obstacles by calling isTouching method.
        参数:
        fromX - left edge of the rectangular area
        toX - right edge of the rectangular area
        fromY - upper edge of the rectangular area
        toY - bottom edge of the rectangular area
        返回:
        false is at least one point in this area is touching obstacles, true if all the area is not touching obstacles.

      • CreateMaze

        public void CreateMaze()
        Initialize obstacles and ghostObstacles for the maze.

        All obstacles are initialized with certain position with certain orientation and length to compose and added to the set obstacle and ghostObstacles. Since all obstacles are rectangle, they can be visualized. The visualized maze will have a boundary frame and all vertical and horizontal bar obstacles in it.
